â€œA well-intentioned new musical that is poorly executed...This show has good moments, a very empathetic and likable heroine, and a fun and entertaining score. But...the supporting cast is poorly written and the story is so problematic at times that...the show is being as self-righteous as the characters it is trying to admonish...Sklar and Beguelin have written some great songs...In the midst of clunky pandering to social statements, there is a beautiful love story. I wish we got more of it."
